document_data.name: Probability Travel
document_data.mainbody: '''''Probability travel''''' was a [[psionic]] power of the [[psychoportation]] [[discipline]] that allowed the manifester to travel to other [[plane]]s of reality.
document_data.Users:
* [[Wild talent]]s sometimes allowed people to employ this science.{{cite book/The Complete Psionics Handbook|21}}{{cite book/Player's Option: Skills & Powers|94}}{{cite book/The Complete Book of Necromancers|28}}
* A ''[[staff of the magi]]'' was said to use similar powers, per some early sources.{{cite book/Dungeon Masters Guide 1st edition|134}}
document_data.History: The [[illithid]] that attacked the [[Emerald Dragon]] in the {{yearlinkName|1357}} planned to escape with ''probability travel'' if things got too dicey for it.{{cite book/Waterdeep and the North|63}}
